question: For the square of opposition, which of the following statements are false?
opt3: I and O can be false at the same time
opt4: It can be false that when 'All X are Y' and 'All Y are X' when some X are Y and some Y are X
opt1: Just one exception needs to be shown to demonstrate contradiction
opt2: The 4 categorical propositions are universal affirmative, universal negative, particular affirmative and particular negative
